name: Česká
description:
Use headphones.

Interactive sound picture inspired by a tram junction Česká in Brno call. You hear through the ears of the character, which you can freely move. The sound changes as you and the trams move. Also the trams react to the character as well as each other.

Made in Unity3D, Adobe Illustrator and Ableton Live

Česká from Dominik Konečný on Vimeo.
